text:
If you need and already purchased ESU, you need these resources: 
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows-server/get-started/extended-security-updates-overview
 
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/kb5031043-procedure-to-continue-receiving-security-updates-after-extended-support-has-ended-on-october-10-2023-c1a20132-e34c-402d-96ca-1e785ed51d45
 
If you want to use ARC, you also need:
https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-arc/servers/deliver-extended-security-updates
 
In my case,
I already have KB5031419 installed 
1. installing the SSU of November for 2012 R2: KB5032308
2. installing the Extended Security Updates (ESU) Licensing Preparation Package:
KB5017220
(both updates found in the catalog: https://www.catalog.update.microsoft.com/
)
3. restart the service: Restart-Service wuauserv -Verbose -PassThru
4. Rescan againt WU/MU
allowed me to get security updates for November on 2012R2 
image.png [cid:ii_lp1ceqbp0]

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] End of support Server 2012
